reviewText: My daughter got me hooked on the anime version of this. Love it! So when I saw they had a live action movie I just had to check it out. I'm so glad I did =) While they did deviate from the anime a bit, it didn't take any of the essence away from it. I only wish they had subbed some of the news paper articles.
Excellent product and great shipping speed!
Really well-done adaptation.  Got me into reading the manga, with a truly unique premise.  The lighter aspects were reminiscent of the first Death Note movie, which I also liked a lot.

This is apparently an all-region bootleg, meaning it's likely to be poor quality with bad English subtitles. Instead look up the Hong Kong blu-ray, which is region-A compatible with professionally done subtitles, and is the most superior quality. A well-done entertaining movie like this totally deserves that much.
Awesome movie! Definitely worth buying if you're a fan of the manga or anime. I can't wait to see part 2!
can't wait for the next one
